summary: This bill, the 'Combatting China’s Pilfering of Intellectual Property Act,' or the CCP IP Act, aims to impose sanctions on individuals and entities in China involved in the theft of U.S. intellectual property. It includes asset blocking and visa restrictions. Additionally, it restricts visas for certain Chinese officials and military personnel. The President can waive sanctions under specific conditions. The bill also mandates reports on sanctioned individuals and the efficacy of visa screening mechanisms.
